title: Kairaku no Sono
description:
Reprint of "Kairakuen" with extra chapter.

1-5. Hitsuji-tachi no Monzetsu (Sheep's Faint in Pain)
6. Shift
7. Mansion Tsuma (Mansion Wife)
8. Imouto Shibari (Little Sister Bondage)
9. Gibo (Stepmother)
10. A Carefree Maiden (Everything Is Okay in the End)
